name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
ingredients: 1 T corn oil 1 12 oz can cream corn
1 onion chopped 2 4oz cans chopped green chilies
1 clove garlic, minced 1 15 oz can S&W redi-­‐cut tomatoes, undrained
6 halves chicken breasts, skinned and cooked 1 t oregano
1 15 oz can hominy, drained 1 T chili powder
1 15 oz can white beans, drained 1 C shredded Monterey Jack Cheese
steps: Cook onion, garlic, and cumin in hot oil in until tender. Stir in chopped chicken. Add beans, corn, chilies,
tomatoes chicken stock, oregano, and chili powder. Stir with a wooden spoon to blend. Cover and cook chili
over low heat until flavors blend, about 30 minutes. Serve with salsa, cheese, and tortilla chips.
